description: Defines the AccountsScreen widget for a Flutter application, managing the display, fetching, and addition of user accounts including UI elements such as app bar, list of accounts, and account creation form.

classes.name: AccountsScreen
classes.description: Main widget displaying the list of user accounts with options to add new accounts.

classes.name: _AccountForm
classes.description: Internal widget for adding a new account via a bottom sheet form.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the widget state and triggers account fetch.

methods.name: _openAddForm
methods.description: Opens a modal bottom sheet with the account creation form.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the accounts screen, including list and loading state.

methods.name: _AccountForm
methods.description: Widget managing the form for account creation.

methods.name: _submit
